name: Jericho
descriptions: Jericho is a former raider residing in Megaton in the Capital Wasteland in Fallout 3. He is a possible companion of the Lone Wanderer.

In his past, Jericho was a ruthless and deadly raider, killing and stealing for measly amounts of caps and loot for even the slightest of reasons. After fighting along with other raider gangs for many years and becoming a crack shot with a rifle, Jericho saw fit to retire and settled down in Megaton to enjoy his twilight years. Despite being out of the game for a long time, he has not lost touch with his raider ways. While the smug-lipped, foul-mouth Jericho will lend his marksmanship to protect the town, he more often than not prefers to guzzle booze and spew curses at passersby completely care-free. Rumors are abound that he also occasionally does some odd jobs for Colin Moriarty.

By the time the Lone Wanderer leaves Vault 101 in 2277, Jericho has begun having thoughts about getting back out into the wastes to fight and kill freely, though he'd prefer if he was paid for equipment expenses upfront as a start.
Jericho appears in Fallout 3 and Fallout Shelter.
PC Playstation 3 Xbox 360 Like all other Megaton characters, Jericho might go missing or turn up dead. See recovering missing non-player character in Fallout 3 on how to resolve this issue.
Jericho's name is a reference to the biblical city of Jericho, the remains of which are a UNESCO World Heritage Site and considered to be the oldest fortified city in the world.

topics.topic_text: Get out of here, Jericho. You're fired.
topics.response_text: What? Are you serious?

topics.topic_text: Nah. I'm just kidding.
topics.response_text: Yeah, very funny. Ha ha. Hilarious.

topics.topic_text: Don't make me repeat myself.
topics.response_text: I see how it is: the old man can't keep up. Whatever. I'm gonna go see if there's anything left of Megaton.

topics.topic_text: Let's get back out there, Jericho.
topics.response_text: Sorry, kid. I just can't roll with someone like you.

topics.topic_text: You don't look like you belong here. What's your story?
topics.response_text: There ain't much to tell. I used to live out in the Wastes. I was a real bastard back then. But I've put all that behind me.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Whatever, kid. Whatever.

topics.topic_text: Are you interested in joining up with me?
topics.response_text: No offense, kid, but you're not exactly the type I'm used to runnin' with.

topics.topic_text: Out there in the Wastes, man. You must be bored to tears in this town.
topics.response_text: I left all that behind me. There's nothing but bullshit out there: killing... stealing... violence... I'm not that guy anymore.

topics.topic_text: Yeah... Killing. Stealing. Sounds fun, doesn't it?
topics.response_text: You know, I do miss it sometimes... it's a life of freedom, you know?

topics.topic_text: You should come with me. I could use a hand.
topics.response_text: No offense, kid, but you're not exactly the type I'm used to runnin' with.

topics.topic_text: Here you go. Let's get out of here.
topics.response_text: Haha! This is gonna be great! Some good ol' fashioned violence!

topics.topic_text: Actually, never mind. I don't need your help.
topics.response_text: Huhn. I see how it is. No use for a washed up old waster, huh? Well, kid, the offer's open any time you wanna take it.

topics.topic_text: Finding a crew might be tough. Good luck, though.
topics.response_text: What the hell? You get me all worked up and then cut me off? Well... look... if you ever need a hand out there, you know where to find me.

topics.topic_text: You're right. That sounds terrible.
topics.response_text: Huhn. Yeah... you're right. Stupid idea anyway.

topics.topic_text: You know what? Forget I said anything.
topics.response_text: Why the fuck would you start saying it if you weren't going to finish. Back out where? What are you talking about?

topics.topic_text: I was talking about the Wastes. You must be going crazy in this place.
topics.response_text: You know, I do miss it sometimes... it's a life of freedom, you know?

topics.topic_text: No, really. Never mind.
topics.response_text: I see how it is. You'd best think twice before fucking with me again.

topics.topic_text: Let's get going.
topics.response_text: Right on. I'm ready for more action.

topics.topic_text: Not just yet. I wanted to talk to you about something.
topics.response_text: Yeah? What do you want now?

topics.topic_text: I just wanted to make sure you were still here. Goodbye.
topics.response_text: What the fu... you think that's funny?

topics.topic_text: Jericho, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
topics.response_text: Fuck that. Do your own dirty work.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about your tactics.
topics.response_text: You think you got a better idea?

topics.topic_text: I want you to change your combat style.
topics.response_text: Oh yeah? To what?

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: You talk too damn much, anyone ever told you that?

topics.topic_text: That's all. Let's get going.
topics.response_text: Right behind you, kid.

topics.topic_text: I like what you're doing. Stick with the melee.
topics.response_text: Shit yeah, you do.

topics.topic_text: You're not bad with a ranged weapon. Keep it up.
topics.response_text: You're goddamn right I'm not bad. I've been doin' this for 25 goddamn years.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
topics.response_text: Yeah... okay. You got a better idea?

topics.topic_text: You're good where you are.
topics.response_text: You're damn right I'm good, kid.

topics.topic_text: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Talk, talk, talk...

topics.topic_text: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
topics.response_text: C'mon, kid, why are we standin' around here?

topics.topic_text: Keep hanging back.
topics.response_text: That's what I'm doing. Why do you think I'm standing back here in East Bumfuck?

topics.topic_text: Enough about tactics.
topics.response_text: Yeah. Less talking about killing. More killing!

topics.topic_text: Let's trade equipment.
topics.response_text: Sure, gimme whatever you got.

topics.topic_text: Wait here.
topics.response_text: Don't piss around, I don't want to be standing here with my thumb up my ass all day.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Oh, fuck no. I don't take that shit from anyone. You're dead!

topics.topic_text: So where's the key?
topics.response_text: It's dangling around Colin's neck. Get it... if you can.

topics.topic_text: Why haven't you robbed him?
topics.response_text: My robbin' days are over, kid. I'm just here to drink and stink.

topics.topic_text: Sounds risky. What if he catches me?
topics.response_text: He'll probably blow your head off. That is, unless you can draw faster than a pissed off Irishman.

topics.topic_text: Thanks for the info, Jericho.
topics.response_text: Anytime. It'll be worth it to see the look on that asshole's face.

topics.topic_text: Did I miss something? What's your problem with me?
topics.response_text: You're from the outside and I've lived too much of my life out there to trust every jackass nobody that wanders in from the Wasteland.

topics.topic_text: Whatever your problem is, I suggest you get over it. Now.
topics.response_text: Well, now. That's something I didn't expect. You're scrappy for a little Vault twerp aren't you?

topics.topic_text: Never mind...
topics.response_text: You're goddamn right "nevermind".

topics.topic_text: This should buy you something. <Give 10 caps.>
topics.response_text: Ha ha! You're gonna have to do better than that, kid! Thanks for the drink, though.

topics.topic_text: Funny. I'll take my caps back now.
topics.response_text: Alright, alright, I'm just fucking with you.

topics.topic_text: You're an asshole, Jericho.
topics.response_text: You love me.

topics.topic_text: Go for the top shelf. On me. <Give 20 caps.>
topics.response_text: Whoa, twenty caps! Look at the big spender! Alright then, I can see you're in it for the big money, so I'll tell you all about Moriarty's.{The first half of this line is spoken in a sarcastic "Golly gee gosh, Mister Wilson, a whole dollar!" way.}

topics.topic_text: I don't think so.
topics.response_text: Your call, kid.

topics.topic_text: That's all I needed to know.
topics.response_text: Yeah.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for my father. Middle-aged guy. Maybe you've seen him?
topics.response_text: Are you fucking kidding me? Get out of my face.

topics.topic_text: What's the word around town?
topics.response_text: Remember what I told you, kid: Moriarty keeps his money locked up right next to his bed.
